name: Ten ni Kou Gaiden ~Ai~
nutshell:
The first volume in the spin-off series of the Chinese love story, Ten ni Kou.
This spin-off will reveal the unknown tales that were not shown in the main story.

name: Maruo Jigoku
nutshell: Collection of short stories by Maruo, includes The Golden Notebook (Kin no Techou), Farewell Showa, and Poison Strawberry.

name: Kimi to Boku.
nutshell: Shun, Kaname, and the twins Yuuki and Yuuta have been friends since kindergarten. It's a little hard to tell if they actually get along or not - but even as high-school students, they hang out together. Recently, they've had a new addition; a half-Japanese transfer student Chizuru, who has started to liven up the group. This manga is really just about their daily lives, which aren't particularly passionate or exciting. A tranquil and sometimes comedic story of youthful friendship…

name: Miwaku no Hana
nutshell:
"A Bewildering Flower" is about a college student who's in love with her friend.
Kyouko, a university student, is in love with her best friend Masumi, and is getting to the point where she can't stand it any more. Cue alcohol.

name: Legend of Yu Chan
nutshell: Dans ce monde, il existe des monstres qui se cachent sous une apparence humaine, ils tuent et mangent des humains. Un groupe de personnes appelés les Taoists sont là pour tuer ces monstres et protéger les humains.

name: Inu to Omawari-san
nutshell: Dog-complex policeman, Miyoshi, was captivated by the popular model, Kanae, who always looks like a stray dog. However, Kanae never paid attention to him, until a day Miyoshi managed to get close to him thanks to an incident. Will the love of these two naïve people be able to go smoothly?

name: Saaya and Sakura
nutshell: Collection of short stories posted on author's twitter featuring an age-gap couple - Saaya and Sakura

name: Onegai Twins
nutshell: Onegai Twins is a cute, incestuous love story between a boy and two girls who are supposedly his long-lost twin sisters. The story follows Maiku, Karen, and Miina. Maiku is a high school boy orphaned at an early age, now living in a house he believes is the house he grew up in.

name: Is Love Covered by Insurance?
tags: Oneshot,Sci-Fi,Official Colored,Romance,Philosophical,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Aliens,Full Color
nutshell:
In a universe where humans are more delicate in noticing emotions than any other creature, a human-based insurance company provides services to married couples across the universe.
Links:
Author's Twitter
Author's Website

name: What Happens in Heaven Stays in Heaven
Honjitsu no Goyoumei wa?
nutshell:
Collection of oneshots.
1-3. Honjitsu no Goyoumei wa?


Koi wa Amai ka, Shoppai ka (Is Love Sweet or Salty?)
An optimistic guy and a sullen intelligent man. In order to save the store this mismatched couple comes together!? The love story of two childhood friends.


Houkago ni Kiss


Honjitsu no Goyoumei wa? - Honjitsu no Otodoke Mono desu

name: Urara-Chan Wa Puroresu Nante Daikirai
nutshell: "Urara-chan hates professional wrestling!" Is a comedy centered around Urara Momonoi, who is rumored to be the most beautiful girl in school, and her brother Masaki. Masaki, who loves professional wrestling, teaches lies such as "Pro-wrestling is a national sport of Japan", "Girls are hubbed if they don't know the Heisei Ishingun", and "Christmas is a current blast match" in order to talk to Urara. I was out. Urara, who has a grudge against Masaki because he has floated from the surroundings, challenges the game by playing wrestling in order to defeat his brother and graduate from professional wrestling.

name: What Would You Do If You Were To Die Tomorrow?
nutshell:
Sou is a God of Death, who's fallen behind on her quota. She looks through the 'Black Book' filled with dangerous souls. Though when she offers Ashiya Makoto anything she wants in exchange for her soul she gets an unexpected request!
Link:
The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon

name: Hana to Konjou: Boudai Danshi ni Koishimashita.
nutshell: Kitayama Hatsuki works part-time at a flower shop where she met an intimidating “officer” - Takamiya Ryo. As it turns out, he is the brother of the owner, currently attending National Defense Academy, and was just teasing her with the scary act. Their clumsy flirting is super cute.

name: The Story of a Girl Who Wants to Grow Up Quickly
